mapper.sql: COMP_ID, COMP_NAME, ALLY_STAT, UPPER_COMP_ID, COMP_LEVEL_TYPE, COMP_TYPE, CPN_RTIME_ISSUE_YN, COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN, ZIPCODE, ADDR, ADDR_DETAIL, MAIN_NUMBER, PHONE_NO, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, LIMIT_AMOUNT_DAY, LIMIT_AMOUNT_WEEK, LIMIT_AMOUNT_MONTH, LIMIT_AMOUNT_YEAR, BUSINESS_NO, GPS_X, GPS_Y, SHOP_INFO_URL, COMP_SHOP_ID, MEMB_ID, REG_USER, REG_DTM, MID_SHOP_ID, CHG_USER, CHG_DTM, REGION_TYPE, MANAGER_NAME,MEMO, (CONVERT(CHAR(10), REG_DTM, 23)) AS REG_DTM_STR, (CONVERT(CHAR(10), CHG_DTM, 23)) AS CHG_DTM_STR, CASE WHEN ALLY_STAT='01' THEN '제휴' WHEN ALLY_STAT='00' THEN '중단' ELSE '' END AS ALLY_STAT_STR
mapper.select:
select
distinct
top ${rowsPerPage}
A.COMP_ID ,A.COMP_NAME ,A.ALLY_STAT ,A.UPPER_COMP_ID ,A.COMP_LEVEL_TYPE ,A.COMP_TYPE ,A.ZIPCODE ,ISNULL(A.COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN,'N') AS COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN ,A.ADDR ,A.ADDR_DETAIL ,A.MAIN_NUMBER ,A.PHONE_NO ,A.MOBILE_PHONE ,A.EMAIL ,A.MEMO ,A.BUSINESS_NO ,A.REG_USER ,A.REG_DTM ,A.CHG_USER ,A.CHG_DTM ,A.MANAGER_NAME ,A.COMP_SHOP_ID ,A.MID_SHOP_ID ,A.LIMIT_AMOUNT_DAY ,A.LIMIT_AMOUNT_MONTH ,A.LIMIT_AMOUNT_WEEK ,A.LIMIT_AMOUNT_YEAR ,D.memb_id ,B.COMP_NAME AS FRANCHISE_NAME ,B.COMP_ID AS FRANCHISE_ID ,C.COMP_NAME AS PARTNER_NAME ,C.COMP_ID AS PARTNER_ID ,D.name AS MEMB_NAME ,D.UPPER_MEMB_ID ,A.MID_SHOP_ID
,(CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MW_MS_COMP_PAYMENT E WHERE /*E.COMP_ID=C.COMP_ID)>0 OR*/ E.COMP_ID=B.COMP_ID)>0 OR (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MW_MS_COMP_PAYMENT E /*WHERE E.COMP_ID=C.COMP_ID)>0)*/ WHERE E.COMP_ID=B.COMP_ID)>0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS COMPLEX_YN
,(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MW_MS_COMP_PAYMENT F WHERE F.COMP_ID=A.COMP_ID)=0 THEN B.COMP_ID ELSE A.COMP_ID END) AS MOVE_ID
,(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.REG_DTM, 23)) AS REG_DTM_STR ,(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.CHG_DTM, 23)) AS CHG_DTM_STR FROM MW_CM_COMPANY A INNER JOIN MW_CM_COMPANY B ON A.UPPER_COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID INNER JOIN MW_CM_COMPANY C ON B.UPPER_COMP_ID = C.COMP_ID INNER JOIN memb_cardlist D ON C.COMP_ID = D.COMP_ID /*AND D.BRAN_ID = ( CASE WHEN D.BRAN_ID IS NOT NULL THEN B.COMP_ID ELSE NULL END )*/ /*AND B.COMP_ID = D.BRAN_ID*/
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
top ${rowsPerPage}
A.COMP_ID ,A.COMP_NAME ,A.ALLY_STAT ,A.UPPER_COMP_ID ,A.COMP_LEVEL_TYPE ,A.COMP_TYPE ,A.ZIPCODE ,A.ADDR ,ISNULL(A.COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN,'N') AS COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN ,A.ADDR_DETAIL ,A.MAIN_NUMBER ,A.PHONE_NO ,A.MOBILE_PHONE ,A.EMAIL ,A.MEMO ,A.BUSINESS_NO ,A.REG_USER ,A.REG_DTM ,A.CHG_USER ,A.CHG_DTM ,A.MANAGER_NAME ,A.MEMB_ID ,A.MID_SHOP_ID ,B.COMP_NAME AS PARTNER_NAME ,B.COMP_ID AS PARTNER_ID ,ISNULL(C.multi_yn,'N') AS MULTY_YN ,(CASE WHEN ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MW_MS_COMP_PAYMENT E WHERE E.COMP_ID=A.COMP_ID)>0 OR (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MW_MS_COMP_PAYMENT E WHERE E.COMP_ID=B.COMP_ID)>0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS COMPLEX_YN
,(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MW_MS_COMP_PAYMENT E WHERE E.COMP_ID=B.COMP_ID)=0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS COMPLEX_YN
,(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MW_MS_COMP_PAYMENT E WHERE E.COMP_ID=A.COMP_ID)=0 THEN B.COMP_ID ELSE A.COMP_ID END) AS MOVE_ID
,(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.REG_DTM, 23)) AS REG_DTM_STR ,(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.CHG_DTM, 23)) AS CHG_DTM_STR
,(SELECT D.IMAGE_URL FROM MW_CM_IMAGE D WHERE D.ID = A.COMP_ID AND D.OS_TYPE='01' AND D.USE_TYPE='01')AS MEM_LIST_3GS ,(SELECT E.IMAGE_URL FROM MW_CM_IMAGE E WHERE E.ID = A.COMP_ID AND E.OS_TYPE='02' AND E.USE_TYPE='01')AS MEM_LIST_4S ,(SELECT F.IMAGE_URL FROM MW_CM_IMAGE F WHERE F.ID = A.COMP_ID AND F.OS_TYPE='11' AND F.USE_TYPE='01')AS MEM_LIST_ANDROID
FROM MW_CM_COMPANY A INNER JOIN MW_CM_COMPANY B ON A.UPPER_COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID FULL JOIN memb_cardlist C ON A.COMP_ID = C.BRAN_ID
order by ${orderByClause}
select count(*) FROM MW_CM_COMPANY A INNER JOIN MW_CM_COMPANY B ON A.UPPER_COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID FULL JOIN memb_cardlist C ON A.COMP_ID = C.BRAN_ID

select count(*) FROM MW_CM_COMPANY A INNER JOIN MW_CM_COMPANY B ON A.UPPER_COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID INNER JOIN MW_CM_COMPANY C ON B.UPPER_COMP_ID = C.COMP_ID INNER JOIN memb_cardlist D ON C.COMP_ID = D.COMP_ID
/*AND B.COMP_ID = D.BRAN_ID*/
mapper.insert:

ALLY_STAT,

ADDR,

MAIN_NUMBER,

LIMIT_AMOUNT_DAY,

LIMIT_AMOUNT_MONTH,
LIMIT_AMOUNT_YEAR,
BUSINESS_NO,
GPS_X,
GPS_Y,
SHOP_INFO_URL,
COMP_SHOP_ID,
MEMB_ID,

MEMO,

mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT 'SHP' +SUBSTRING(REPLICATE('0',9),0,10-LEN(ISNULL(RIGHT(MAX(COMP_ID),9),0)+1)) +LTRIM(STR((ISNULL(RIGHT(MAX(COMP_ID),9),0)+1))) FROM MW_CM_COMPANY WHERE COMP_ID LIKE 'SHP%') AS COMP_ID
SELECT (SELECT 'BRD' +SUBSTRING(REPLICATE('0',9),0,10-LEN(ISNULL(RIGHT(MAX(COMP_ID),9),0)+1)) +LTRIM(STR((ISNULL(RIGHT(MAX(COMP_ID),9),0)+1))) FROM MW_CM_COMPANY WHERE COMP_ID LIKE 'BRD%') AS COMP_ID
mapper.insert:

(SELECT 'CMP' +SUBSTRING(REPLICATE('0',9),0,10-LEN(ISNULL(RIGHT(MAX(COMP_ID),9),0)+1)) +LTRIM(STR((ISNULL(RIGHT(MAX(COMP_ID),9),0)+1))) ),

mapper.update:
update MW_CM_COMPANY
COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_NAME = #{record.compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLY_STAT = #{record.allyStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
UPPER_COMP_ID = #{record.upperCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_LEVEL_TYPE = #{record.compLevelType,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMP_TYPE = #{record.compType,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMPLEX_YN = #{record.complexYn,jdbcType=CHAR}
MULTY_YN = #{record.multyYn,jdbcType=CHAR}
CPN_RTIME_ISSUE_YN = #{record.cpnRtimeIssueYn,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN = #{record.complexPaymentYn,jdbcType=CHAR},
ZIPCODE = #{record.zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR = #{record.addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR_DETAIL = #{record.addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_NUMBER = #{record.mainNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_NUMBER = '',
PHONE_NO = #{record.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{record.mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = '',
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_DAY = #{record.limitAmountDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_WEEK = #{record.limitAmountWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_MONTH = #{record.limitAmountMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_YEAR = #{record.limitAmountYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUSINESS_NO = #{record.businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_NO = '',
GPS_X = #{record.gpsX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GPS_Y = #{record.gpsY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_INFO_URL = #{record.shopInfoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_SHOP_ID = #{record.compShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMB_ID = #{record.membId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_USER = #{record.regUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_DTM = #{record.regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHG_USER = #{record.chgUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHG_DTM = #{record.chgDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGION_TYPE = #{record.regionType,jdbcType=CHAR},
MANAGER_NAME = #{record.managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
MEMO = '',
MID_SHOP_ID = #{record.midShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update MW_CM_COMPANY set COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_NAME = #{record.compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLY_STAT = #{record.allyStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPPER_COMP_ID = #{record.upperCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_LEVEL_TYPE = #{record.compLevelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, COMP_TYPE = #{record.compType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CPN_RTIME_ISSUE_YN = #{record.cpnRtimeIssueYn,jdbcType=CHAR}, COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN = #{record.complexPaymentYn,jdbcType=CHAR}, ZIPCODE = #{record.zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{record.addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR_DETAIL = #{record.addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_NUMBER = #{record.mainNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NO = #{record.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{record.mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_DAY = #{record.limitAmountDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_WEEK = #{record.limitAmountWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_MONTH = #{record.limitAmountMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_YEAR = #{record.limitAmountYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_NO = #{record.businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GPS_X = #{record.gpsX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GPS_Y = #{record.gpsY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_INFO_URL = #{record.shopInfoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_SHOP_ID = #{record.compShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMB_ID = #{record.membId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER = #{record.regUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DTM = #{record.regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHG_USER = #{record.chgUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHG_DTM = #{record.chgDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REGION_TYPE = #{record.regionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, MANAGER_NAME = #{record.managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update MW_CM_COMPANY set COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_NAME = #{record.compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLY_STAT = #{record.allyStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPPER_COMP_ID = #{record.upperCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_LEVEL_TYPE = #{record.compLevelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, COMP_TYPE = #{record.compType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CPN_RTIME_ISSUE_YN = #{record.cpnRtimeIssueYn,jdbcType=CHAR}, COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN = #{record.complexPaymentYn,jdbcType=CHAR}, ZIPCODE = #{record.zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{record.addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR_DETAIL = #{record.addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_NUMBER = #{record.mainNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NO = #{record.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{record.mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_DAY = #{record.limitAmountDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_WEEK = #{record.limitAmountWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_MONTH = #{record.limitAmountMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_AMOUNT_YEAR = #{record.limitAmountYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_NO = #{record.businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GPS_X = #{record.gpsX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GPS_Y = #{record.gpsY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_INFO_URL = #{record.shopInfoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_SHOP_ID = #{record.compShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMB_ID = #{record.membId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER = #{record.regUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DTM = #{record.regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHG_USER = #{record.chgUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHG_DTM = #{record.chgDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REGION_TYPE = #{record.regionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, MANAGER_NAME = #{record.managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update MW_CM_COMPANY
COMP_NAME = #{compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLY_STAT = #{allyStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
UPPER_COMP_ID = #{upperCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_LEVEL_TYPE = #{compLevelType,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMP_TYPE = #{compType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CPN_RTIME_ISSUE_YN = #{cpnRtimeIssueYn,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMPLEX_PAYMENT_YN = #{complexPaymentYn,jdbcType=CHAR},
ZIPCODE = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR_DETAIL = #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_NUMBER = #{mainNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_NO = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_DAY = #{limitAmountDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_WEEK = #{limitAmountWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_MONTH = #{limitAmountMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_AMOUNT_YEAR = #{limitAmountYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GPS_X = #{gpsX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GPS_Y = #{gpsY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_INFO_URL = #{shopInfoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_SHOP_ID = #{compShopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMB_ID = #{membId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_USER = #{regUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_DTM = #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHG_USER = #{chgUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHG_DTM = #{chgDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGION_TYPE = #{regionType,jdbcType=CHAR},
MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
